item.title: BiPolar Sigmoid
item.description: A BiPolar sigmoid function is $$ \sigma(x) = \frac{1-e^{-x}}{1+e^{-x}}. $$ Visualization Bipolar Sigmoid

item.title: Uni-Polar Sigmoid
item.description: A uni-Polar sigmoid function is $$ \sigma(x) = \frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}. $$ Visualization Uni-polar Sigmoid function Tricks A very useful trick: $$ 1 - \sigma(x) = \sigma(-x). $$
